00057 #ifndef INT_SYMBOL_H
00058 #define INT_SYMBOL_H
00059 
00060 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00061 #include <config.h>
00062 
00063 /*
00064  * INT symbol table structures and prototypes
00065  */
00066 typedef struct INT_Symbol
00067 {
00068   /* 20020909 SZU
00069    * Change to long for 64-bit pure
00070    * 20040112 SZU
00071    * long could have portability issues; couldn't find reason for fix.
00072    * Therefore change back to int.
00073    */
00074   int value;                    /* Int value of symbol */
00075   //long value;                    /* Int value of symbol */
00076   void *data;                   /* Data struct pointed to */
00077   struct INT_Symbol_Table *table;       /* For deletion of symbol */
00078   struct INT_Symbol *next_hash; /* For table's hash table */
00079   struct INT_Symbol *prev_hash;
00080   struct INT_Symbol *next_symbol;       /* For table's contents list */
00081   struct INT_Symbol *prev_symbol;
00082 
00083 }
00084 INT_Symbol;
00085 
00086 typedef struct INT_Symbol_Table
00087 {
00088   char *name;                   /* For error messages */
00089   INT_Symbol **hash;            /* Array of size hash_size */
00090   int hash_size;                /* Must be power of 2 */
00091   int hash_mask;                /* AND mask, (hash_size - 1) */
00092   int resize_size;              /* When reached, resize hash table */
00093   INT_Symbol *head_symbol;      /* Contents list */
00094   INT_Symbol *tail_symbol;
00095   int symbol_count;
00096 }
00097 INT_Symbol_Table;
00098 
00099 #ifdef __cplusplus
00100 extern "C"
00101 {
00102 #endif
00103 
00104   extern INT_Symbol_Table *INT_new_symbol_table (char *name,
00105                                                  int expected_size);
00106   extern void INT_delete_symbol_table (INT_Symbol_Table * table,
00107                                        void (*free_routine) (void *));
00108   extern INT_Symbol *INT_add_symbol (INT_Symbol_Table * table, int value,
00109                                      void *data);
00110   extern INT_Symbol *INT_find_symbol (INT_Symbol_Table * table, int value);
00111   extern void *INT_find_symbol_data (INT_Symbol_Table * table, int value);
00112   extern void INT_delete_symbol (INT_Symbol * symbol,
00113                                  void (*free_routine) (void *));
00114 
00115 /* For debugging hashing function only */
00116   extern void INT_print_symbol_table_hash (FILE * out,
00117                                            INT_Symbol_Table * table);
00118 
00119 #ifdef __cplusplus
00120 }
00121 #endif
00122 
00123 #endif
